now whisk together until well combined
and set off to the side next step you're

you're gonna heat to be anywhere from

i also feel a lot of nostalgia because i
used to bake with my grandma and she
used to always knead dough by hand it's
also a little bit messy and i like
getting a little messy when i'm baking
sprinkle a little bit of flour on the
work surface in front of you spread it
around you don't want your dough to
stick and your dough is going to be
sticky you also want to get some flour

right in front of you now we're going to

if you want to add a little pinch more

it doesn't stick to your hand right now

wrap over the top
look at this our dough has risen this is

plop it out right in front of you now
we're gonna roll out the dough to be
